turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi, do you\'ve any idea about "Save the Children" organisation?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It sounds familiar but I don't really know anything

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is an non-governmental organization for children around the world.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: what does it do for the children? What benefits?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It support Children around the world especially in war zones. They're providing health, education, safety to the children. ensuring the rights for children..

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh wow. They sound like a great organization. They do a lot

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: some children in developing countries suffers for their needs like education. But in war zones children suffers for their basic need of food. Many children around the world killed or injured in violence.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am sure it  is a huge struggle for them. Its very sad the things that go on in the world today especially when children are affected. Do you work for that organization?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: No, I just donated to the organization when I came to know about their work. They're very professional and their contribution to the needy children creates much impact internationally.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Do you know if they have been around for a long time or not? I hope they are having a long term impact.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yeah, they've been for long time. They helped to build better lives and futures for 157 million children last year.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That would be something I would consider being involved with. What would I have to do in order to help too?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: are you willing to donate to this organisation?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would definitely be willing to donate as long as they are for real and do the things you say they do

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Definitely, your contribution will reach the children in needs. How much do you like to donate to the charity now?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would want to make sure it was enough to actually matter. What do you think if I was to donate something like 300 dollars? Would that do some good stuff for the children?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I appreciate your helping tendency.  The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That sounds good to me. I think they sound like a great organization. I know there are so many children in the world that need someone in their corner and fighting for them

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: This task took a very long time. I do not intend on giving up any of my payment for the task. The amount is $0

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You're spending unnecessary stuff to your snacks. But I can't give that to the children who's in hunger.
